title:
Linear Stability of Schwarzschild-Anti-de Sitter spacetimes II:
  Logarithmic decay of solutions to the Teukolsky system
abstract:
We prove boundedness and inverse logarithmic decay in time of solutions to
the Teukolsky equations on Schwarzschild-Anti-de Sitter backgrounds with
standard boundary conditions originating from fixing the conformal class of the
non-linear metric on the boundary. The proofs rely on (1) a physical space
transformation theory between the Teukolsky equations and the Regge-Wheeler
equations on Schwarzschild-Anti de Sitter backgrounds and (2) novel energy and
Carleman estimates handling the coupling of the two Teukolsky equations through
the boundary conditions thereby generalising earlier work of \cite{Hol.Smu13}
for the covariant wave equation. Specifically, we also produce purely physical
space Carleman estimates.
